long_description: Light and low-profile, the Lowepro 3-way camera strap is three camera straps in one compact design, transforming quickly from wrist to neck to shoulder carrying positions with a push of a button. Innovative locking retractor makes it easy to adjust the strap with a simple pull. The Lowepro 3-way camera strap's layered pad merges four fabrics to create a light, thin and comfortable cushion that evenly distributes your camera's weight. Made from Durable Dyneema(R) cording.
short_description: Light and low-profile, the Lowepro 3-way camera strap is three camera straps in one compact design, transforming quickly from wrist to neck to shoulder carrying positions with a push of a button.
